H0.text: What is the main currency of Bali, Java, Sulawesi, and several thousand other islands of the same nation. Dollar

H1.text: What is the main currency of Bali, Java, Sulawesi, and several thousand other islands of the same nation. Peso

H2.text: What is the main currency of Bali, Java, Sulawesi, and several thousand other islands of the same nation. Baht

H3.text: What is the main currency of Bali, Java, Sulawesi, and several thousand other islands of the same nation. Rupiah

A4.text: The rupiah (symbol: Rp; currency code: IDR) is the official currency of Indonesia, issued and controlled by Bank Indonesia.

A5.text: The rupiah was introduced in 1946 by Indonesian nationalists fighting for independence.
